question: 人柄
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>person</kanji>'s <kanji>pattern</kanji> is the pattern of actions which they take to become who they are. What do they usually do? What is their pattern? This is the same as their <vocabulary>personal character</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>personality</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings are both kun'yomi readings, combined. For <ja>人</ja> you'll just have to remember this. With <ja>柄</ja> that's the reading you learned anyways, so that makes things easier. Just keep it consistent!
